name: The Cards Strike 12
description:
The Cards Strike 12

A simple card game about getting the clock to strike midnight!

  • Use [left]/[right] to select a card and then [x]/[z] to play it
  • The clock hand moves by the number on the card (e.g. +3 hours, -2 hours, etc.)
  • To win, get the clock to exactly strike 12
  • If the clock goes forward past 12 you lose (but it can wind back over 12)

This game was made in a rush for the last weekly game jam of the year, but I hope it still brings you some joy!
